page.title: 12SOCIAL GATHERINGS
page.content: The school picnic and sports is held on the school playing field each year. We have races,circuit sports,donkey rides, a tug of war, a father and son's football matchfollowed by a picnic and presentation of awards. Another annual event is the barbecue. There is a disco and a dance.It is held in June.We have a roast pig and a talent contest.At a Stovie Night we dance and eat stovies and there is a bar.Another event is the Minister's Harvest Home.It is called that because it is to celebrate the end of the harvest.The minister plays in the band and people dance to his music.
